character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man was born with a rammer clenched in his then-tiny fist!
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This inherent skill cannot be lost

character_trait_levels.onscreen_name: Born to the Sound of Guns
character_trait_levels.colour_text: This general has, from his first days of service, shown a good grasp of artillery tactics.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: In his mother's womb, this man heard the crash of gunfire - and liked it.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man cannot lose his trait as a master gunner.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This general has a remarkable understanding of the purposes of artillery, and its correct employment.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: As a baby, this man's first word was "GUN!"
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This expertise with artillery cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A childhood spent running wild in the woods has given this man a gift for fieldcraft.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man was born to raise hell in his native backwoods.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This American birthright cannot be set aside.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A rebellious nature and regular beatings from Father have made this man a natural fighter.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man was born mean, and got no better over the years.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man cannot change his fighting nature.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Some claim that this man has native cunning and some native ancestry; the second is never said to his face.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This general was born with native cunning instead of childhood innocence.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man cannot change a mark carried on his character since birth.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man inspires confidence in his followers by his example and his war skills.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Victory in battle has marked this man for greatness.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man is marked for future greatness, as long as he keeps winning battles.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Victory has brought this man authority, and his warriors respect, love and fear him in equal measure.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Repeated victory against his tribal enemies has shown this man his capabilities.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man cannot lose his status as a war leader.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: In battle nothing seems to harm this man. Enemies fall before him, and every plan seems to work without fail.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Many victories have marked this man's life, and it engenders trust from his followers.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man will never lose his special aptitude for battle.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: The Spirits truly watch over this man, and whisper the secrets of victory to him when he dreams.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man's many victories are as numberless as the stars.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man cannot lose the favour of the Spirits.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: '"No, Sir, I cannot cure your piles! I can, however, adequately describe them in Latin!"
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Success in his research has earned this man a doctorate.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This academic honour cannot be lost, only enhanced.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: The work of a lifetime should result in a tenured appointment, and access to the college's wine cellar!
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A long research career has earned this man a position of respectability.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This recognition of worth cannot be lost, only enhanced.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "Only a fool subscribes to false modesty! Sir: I am a genius!"
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A life of achievement has been recognised for its enormous intellectual worth.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This honour to a man in the fullness of years cannot be lost, only enhanced.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "Scientific Truth, Sir, is whatever I and the rest of the academy decide, regardless of God's intention!"
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man's achievements have brought him gentility and his country's highest honours.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This singular honour cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A trembling hand might diminish accuracy and be misconstrued as fear. This man, however, stands motionless.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has fought duels and won.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be removed if the agent is defeated in a duel.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "Sir! You're going to regret making sport with my new hat - by God!"
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has successfully fought several duels.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be removed if the agent is defeated in several duels.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A marksman of prodigious talent, his reputation discourages all but the most serious challengers.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has attained victory in many duels.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait cannot be removed, it is permanent.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: He has proved himself adept with a duelling sword on more than one occasion.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has fought duels and won.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be removed if the agent is defeated in a duel.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Experienced at throwing down gauntlets, this man fearlessly plays the game of death.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has successfully fought several duels.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be removed if the agent is defeated in several duels.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: An inveterate duellist, "He'll die as he lived in a flash of the blade, in a corner forgotten by no one!"
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has been victorious in many duels.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait cannot be removed, it is permanent.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A passionate adherent of his faith, his religious principles sometimes conflict with life in the modern world.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Religion has been a large part of this man's life from birth.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is inherent and cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A gentleman never interferes with his livestock, although he does study them closely.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has an developed an interest in the land, agriculture and the profits thereof.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This intellectual ability cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A gentleman has time to read, think and study, freed as he is from the drudgery of the shit heap.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A scholarly interest in farming, and the time to indulge it, has added to this man's abilities.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This gentleman's taste for research cannot be removed, only sharpened.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "Generally, sir, clever landowners find a book more use than mattock when seeking profit!"
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Time spent in the study of farming has added to this man's abilities.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This gentleman will never lose his interest in rustic affairs.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "Have you read my monograph upon the crossbreeding of sheep, Sir? If not, pray hold your insolent tongue!"
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A lifetime spent in agricultural study has made this man an expert's expert.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This expertise in rural matters is a permanent fixture of this man's character.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Money is remarkable stuff - the lack of what else can stop an army? - and worthy of study.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This intellectual has a theoretical interest in money and its uses.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This ability cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Loans, debts, bonds and accounts make a fascinating study - for the right kind of mind.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A scholarly interest in high finance has greatly added to this man's abilities.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This ability cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man's writings are probably understood by a handful of others - which makes him an influential thinker indeed!
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Time spent in the study of money and its use has added to this man's abilities.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This ability cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Decades bent over the accounts may seem a waste - until the financial alchemy of turning paper into gold is discovered!
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A lifetime spent studying finance has made this man a published authority.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This ability cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "Where there's muck, there's brass - aye, and knowledge too for a practical man."
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This scholar has a practical, engineering bent to his studies.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This ability cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: There may be trouble at t'mill but, for the right man, there's much to be learned as well.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Time in manufactories has added to this man's scholarly skills.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This ability cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: To start with nothing, and build anything: that teaches a man much.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Long years stained with grease and coal dust have made this man an expert.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This ability cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A lifetime spent amidst the grime of industry gives a certain solidity to a man's opinions and expertise.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A lifetime spent working in industry grants real knowledge and authority.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This ability cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This scholar is definitely more ink- than blood-stained, yet can hold forth sensibly on military affairs.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This scholar's interest in matters military have been given time and scope to develop.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This military knowledge cannot be lost, only enhanced.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man's scholarly works have attracted the favourable opinion of many generals; his thinking advances the art of war.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A scholarly interest in warfare has been allowed to flourish, adding to this man's abilities.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man's military insights can only grow more acute.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man has made a deep study of classical wars, and applied his learning to contemporary strategy.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Time has been well spent on the study of war to give this gentleman his expertise.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man can only improve on his already formidable skills in this field.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man's works are used as text books by aspiring officers in many lands - even among his nation's enemies!
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A lifetime spent studying war has made this man a compleat expert in the arts of war.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This expertise in military affairs cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A love of the sea has informed this man's scholarship, making him an authority on naval matters.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has an interest in seafaring and naval warfare.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This ability cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A love of the sea has informed this man's scholarship, making him an authority on naval matters.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Some little scholarship has added to this man's skills.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This ability cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man's writings are required reading in many naval schools, and even foreigners read his books!
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Time spent in scholarly study of the sea and seamanshio has greatly added to this man's knowledge.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This ability cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man's grasp of all things nautical is deep and profound; his writings are influential and respected.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A lifetime immersed in naval pursuits has made this man a master of the field.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This ability cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man has read until his eyes have grown dim - and his mind exceptionally sharp.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This scholar has an aptitude for the abstruse and obscure discourse of philosophical discussion.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This ability cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A disputatious nature and access to a large library can do much for a man's mind.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Time spent on obscurities and paradoxes have given this man a fine grounding in philosophy.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This ability cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: To some, a lifetime of gazing at clouds seems wasteful, but answers are found in surprising places!
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Decades of scholarship give this man a deep understanding of many matters.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This ability cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Even this man's eructations are a profound discourse upon the meaning of life.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A lifetime of thinking has given this man a fearsome knowledge of philosophy and the humanities.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This ability cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man funds his own experiments, studying for the love of learning as much as the end result.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has carried out technological research for the good of his nation.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Well-respected amongst the scientific community, he attends monthly dinners to discuss new theories with his peers.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has carried out technological research for the benefit of his nation.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: He is driven by a need to discover the workings of the world, and to unravel the mysteries of creation.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has carried out much technological research for the benefit of his nation.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is permanent and cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: The King's favour is a splendid thing, and an encouragement to great future efforts.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Success has earned this man the recognition of his monarch.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This honour cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: He believes the punishment should fit the crime, and be an example to other would-be wrongdoers.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has dealt sternly with unrest amongst the populace.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait cannot be lost, only increased.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Two wrongs do make a right, especially when the weight of law is behind them.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has dealt harshly with unrest amongst the populace.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait cannot be lost, only increased.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "An eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth". This man believes in clarity when it comes to laying down the law.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has dealt brutally with unrest amongst the populace.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man believes in truth and honesty, something he pursues through his work.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This fellow believes that ministers should set the right example.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is permanent and cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A respectable man of moral excellence, he does his duty with dilligence and precision.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This fellow believes that ministers should set the right example.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is permanent and cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: He has great professional and personal integrity, and cannot be tempted or bribed.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This fellow believes that ministers should set the right example.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is permanent and cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: After spending time amongst the native tribes, their barbaric customs have replaced his decent, civilised ways.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has spent too long proselytising in tribal territory.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be lost by spending a lot of time back in his own land.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man has found America to be extremely testing.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Time spent in America without success has soured this man.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man could be persuaded to change his mind if he had a success or two.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man now uses "American" as a swear word, in place of any impious oath.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A long, frustrating time in America has completely soured this man.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man's dislike of the frontier life is now a fixed aspect of his character.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "Preaching to the ignorant is always unpleasant. And have you seen those people eat?"
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Time spent in Europe has not been time well spent.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man may lose his dislike of Europe if he is successful.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man would quite cheerfully consign Europe to Hell-fire.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has spent too long in Europe for his spiritual well being and happiness.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: His dislike will never change.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: The heat. The flies. The ignorant superstitious folk. Why would anyone want to preach here?
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Time spent in India has been entirely wasted for this man.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man may change his mind about India, if he has a success or two.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Even the size of India is part of a conspiracy to sap the spirit of any man.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Too much time has been wasted in India as far as this man is concerned.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man cannot bring himself to set aside his dislike of India.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Even the size of India is part of a conspiracy to sap the spirit of any man.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Too much time has been wasted in India as far as this man is concerned.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man cannot bring himself to set aside his dislike of India.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: There is a rustic charm in all things in America, even in preaching God's lessons.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Time spent in the New World has been time well spent.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: Time and setbacks may make this man reassess his fondness for America.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A simple people, and a simple message of redemption: what could be finer?
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has had successes in his missionary quest.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man has a taste for the frontier life that will never change.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "The title does help when dealing with the lower orders, it's true."
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Repeated success in this man's chosen endeavours has been rewarded.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This great honour cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: The perquisites of high position give a man a large stake in his nation's continued success.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Great success in this man's chosen endeavours has been richly rewarded.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This public recognition cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man has been of constant and successful service to his monarch and his nation.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man's manifest successes require that the Crown rewards him with a position in society.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This honour cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: It is almost impossible to imagine how this man could have brought extra honour to his nation.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: There are no further honours that the Crown can heap upon this man for his long service.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This magnificent honour cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This minor stomach infection will surely be gone by morning. Or possibly the afternoon.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Bad air or bad food: the result is the same.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: Rest and plenty to drink may improve this man's condition.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: There are good grounds for believing that this is cholera, not "something he ate."
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has definitely breathed in some rank miasma.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: There is no cure for this poor fellow.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This unfortunate has caught breakbone fever, and will feel terrible for some time.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Wise physicians hold that this is a disease caused by unpleasant odours.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: Time and rest are the best cures.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: In other men, this might be called cowardice; in this man, it is called pitiable.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A touch of diarrhea is an inevitable part of life for a gentleman.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: Time and a strong brandy should work wonders.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man has a sickness called "influenza" by Italian doctors, and cannot work.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: As the wise Italians would maintain, this man's stars are poorly positioned in the heavens.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: A good rest will help this man recover.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man is marked by his injured extremities.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: God, seemingly, has turned his favour from this unfortunate fellow.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: No reliable cure is known to exist for this affliction.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man is crippled by his disease, and is feared by many.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Perhaps this man's moral shortcomings can explain his infection, or his poor choice of company.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: There is no cure for this disfiguring condition.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man can barely lift his head, let alone a pen or a weapon to carry out his appointed tasks.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has breathed in some foul exhalations, as any good doctor will confirm.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: There seems to be no reliable cure available.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This poor fellow is regularly laid low by bouts of ague.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has long suffered from the ague. It comes and goes.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: There is no cure for this sad condition.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man is covered in small, red pustules. Is it a rash, or something far worse?
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Someone close to this man must have, or have had, the disease.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: With time, he should make a full recovery.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "It's the end of the world, the end of the world, you're suffering from life withdrawal!"
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Swollen buboes that weep pus and rot, sore joints, and the vomiting of blood are the orders of the day. Oh, and let's not forget the terrible agony. Eugh! Nasty...
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man will probably die within a week. Sooner, if lucky.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man is showing all the symptoms of scurvy, from bad breath to aching limbs.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has been away from creature comforts and decent food for too long.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: Decent food and some rest will work wonders.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man has dreadful pustules over his entire body.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has come into contact with a smallpox sufferer.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: Time may heal this man, or he may die. It is in God's hands.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: The smallpox has done its terrible work on this poor fellow.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: He has been exposed to many smallpox victims.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man will be carried off by his fever.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This poor chap can never quite throw off a cold, as he has a weak chest.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has been exposed to others who had the condition.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: There are no cures for consumption, only palliative measures.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Coughing up blood is never a good sign, as any doctor will confirm.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has long had consumption, but has managed to live with the conditionâ€¦
character_trait_levels.removal_text: â€¦until now?

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man has typhus, and is unable to carry out any of his normal duties.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Insanitary living arrangements have caused this affliction.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man may recover, if he does nothing.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man is bedridden, and his servants fear for his life.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Close proximity to too many other people has caused this infection.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man will not survive.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man's fever comes and goes, but his pains remain constant.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has been near sufferers from yellow fever.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: Bed rest is the best cure.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This poor fellow is very ill: puking blood the colour of midnight is never really a good sign.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has been too close to unfortunate's with this disease.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: Time is bed is the best cure, or a dignified way to meet one's Maker.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "There are spies everywhere, you know! Everywhere!"
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Finding spies in your land is never a pleasant thing.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This concern will never be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "I do not trust that doorman. Or that one. Or that maid. Or you."
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Finding spies under almost every rock is an extremely unpleasant thing!
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man's suspicions cannot be assuaged.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: As a child he was awoken with the sound of cannons, followed by rigorous drill before breakfast.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has invested in the army.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be lost by more balanced spending.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man is happiest dressed in full ceremonial garb, medals glittering at his breast.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has invested heavily in the army.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be reduced by more balanced spending.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Insisting all his attendents and ministers salute and stand to attention is possibly taking things too far.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has cut corners to ensure the army is properly funded.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait cannot now be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man's ready wits show up lesser men as dullards.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man's wits are his birthright.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man cannot lose his ready wit.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man has an exceptional intellect, and can be applied to almost any matter.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: It is fortunate indeed when high office and inborn intelligence are linked!
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man's intelligence will always serve his country.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: True cleverness sometimes involves not correcting everyone else's mistakes.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man's mother is reputed to have spent the pregnancy in a library!
character_trait_levels.removal_text: Fortunately, there is no cure for being intelligent!

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A little smut may be considered witty, but not to an ambassador's wife!
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has no intention of "growing up".
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This unfortunate flaw will mark this man until his death.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man's behaviour is boorish and nationally embarrassing, even if the ambassador's wife did have a fantastic arse!
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Youthful obsessions are one thing, but they are supposed to be set aside.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man's ways are set, unfortunately.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man's appalling behaviour would shame any bawd or panderer, let alone a lady of quality... with few scruples.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Youthful excesses can lead a man down some very dark and unpleasant paths.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This disgusting behaviour cannot be mended.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "My John Thomas is a disaster area!"
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Youthful excesses can give a man some unpleasant diseases.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This condition cannot be mended.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man benefits from an amusing lack of intellect.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man's lack of wits can be blamed squarely on his parents.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man muddles through, but he cannot be improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Difficult ideas are difficult, you know. One has to make allowances.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A blow on the head as a child seems to have addled this man's wits.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This lack of quick wits cannot be cured, only endured by his countrymen.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: There are small bedding plants with a greater understanding of life than this man.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Only a terrible shock to this man's mother during pregnancy can explain his appalling weakness of brain.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: Sadly, this deficit of intellect cannot be rectified.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: An advocate of rationality, reason, toleration, and freedom of ideas - although not at the expense of authority.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This leader has funded enlightened technological research.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait will be lost as a result of rebellions against this leader's rule.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Proof, if ever any was needed, that it is not what you know, but who, that matters when it comes to personal success.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This leader has promoted military leaders from amongst friends and relatives.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be removed if military leaders are promoted on merit.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Blessings upon the royal household! An heir has been born, and the line continues!
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This leader has produced an heir.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is permanent.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: An heir and a spare! Surely the succession is now safe, and the future of the royal line assured?
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This leader has produced more than one child.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is permanent.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: The royal family have been blessed with so many children, their continuance is guaranteed.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: The leader has produced an heir and a spare, but shows no signs of stopping there.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is permanent.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man delights in the new, the unusual and the different.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This interest was inculcated at any early age, and may only grow with time.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This interest seems to be inherent.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man shows a marked preference for foreigners, much to the annoyance of his countrymen.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This obsessive interest has been part of this man's character from childhood.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man's obsessions in this area cannot be limited.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Having redecorated his private chambers seventeen times in various foreign styles, this man cannot get enough of the unusual!
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has always been more interested in others than his own kind.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: There is nothing that could persuade this man to change his ways now.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "There are only two ways: my way, and the way to the gibbet at the crossroads. Am I making myself understood?"
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This leader has put down a rebellion.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait is permanent.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Right of rebellion? Traitors don't have rights, but they do make attractive drapes when hanging from the fortifications.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This leader has crushed several rebellions.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait is permanent.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: 'Neath the velvet glove lies an iron hand. There has been occasion to bring it down upon the ungrateful populace.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This leader has put down many insurrections within his territory.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait is permanent.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man understands religion, but it does not have a hold over him.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man learned his attitudes as a youth.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man's lack of faith cannot be changed.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man is openly irreligious, to the intense irritation of some, and the joy of others.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This is a carefully considered position, arrived at as a result of this man's education as a youth.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This is a long-held belief, and will not change now.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man looks beyond the tradition teachings of religion for solutions to mankind's problems.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This is a core belief for this man, from when he was threatened with damnation as a child.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man's principles are fixed and immutable.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Born in the saddle, and with a hunter's keen eye, this man merely follows his natural inclinations.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man was born to hunt.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man's taste for blood cannot be countered.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A healthy interest in bloodsports makes this man popular with his wealthier landowners.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: As soon as he could walk, this man was off with the hounds!
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man's abiding passion is set in stone.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Is there anything else worth doing in life? Exactly. Of course not.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: For a moment, when young, this man didn't think about hunting. He spent that time in the company of a milk maid. Gosh.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man's interest in field sports cannot be changed now.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man is not the sharpest tool in the drawer, and his twitching is a tad disheartening to say the least.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man is the offspring of inbreeding amongst his family members.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This inherent trait cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Hereditary weaknesses have revealed themselves, due entirely to ancestors being far, far too close as a family.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man is the offspring of inbreeding amongst his family members.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This inherent trait cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Wall-eyed cousins should not be allowed to marry, except amongst royalty, and then only rarely.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man is the offspring of inbreeding amongst his family members.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This inherent trait cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Children have so far been unforthcoming, despite the best efforts of his spouse.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has been unable to produce an heir.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be removed if the royal couple conceive a child.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: The royal couple have not been blessed with heirs that lived.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has been unable to produce an heir.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be removed if the royal couple conceive a child.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Providence has not seen fit to bless the royal couple with offspring. Perhaps it is God's will?
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has been unable to produce an heir.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is permanent.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: An "unusual" child, his natural strangeness has only increased with age.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man suffers from an unfortunate malady of the mind.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This inherent trait cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "What, What! Tiddly-pom! A lovely day for oysters, Mother..."
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man suffers from an unfortunate malady of the mind.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This inherent trait cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: The monarch is clearly unwell. The slightest excitement can turn him into a dribbling wreck.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man suffers acutely from an unfortunate malady of the mind.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This inherent trait cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Intellectual debate is encouraged, and the educational welfare of the people is high on the list of priorities.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has pretensions of being an intellectual, and is keen to educate the people.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be removed by ceasing development of educational buildings.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Correspondence flows freely between the ruler and his learned friends, such is his hunger for knowledge.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has pretensions of being an intellectual, and is keen to educate the people.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be reduced by ceasing development of educational buildings.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Intelligentsia have been gathered, so their knowledge and insight are at hand whenever the mood catches.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has pretensions of being an intellectual, and is keen to educate the people.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait cannot be removed.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: There is much worth in the practice of reading the letters of other men.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A spying success is enough to encourage any spymaster.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This interest is a fixed part of this man's character.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Spies and agents of influence in foreign parts help the delberations of government.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Repeated success in the field will always encourage a deeper involvement.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man will not lose his interest in espionage.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A spy sent into the world is merely a true patriot who labours without public honour.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Success is the father of fascination, in any field of human endeavour.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man cannot lose his taste for the business of spying.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Military promotions are based on aptitude and ability for the job in hand. Personal connections are of little value.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This leader has promoted military leaders from the ranks and ratings.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be removed if favourites are promoted to influential positions.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: It is good to know other men's secrets.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Sneakiness is part of this man's character.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man's taste for conspiracy will not change.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: There is something glamorous and dangerous about the shadow world.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has always had a taste for secrets, even as a child.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: There is fun to be had in the shadows, so why change now?

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A man can know many secrets, if he has the right servants in the right shadows.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: As a child, secrets gave this man power over adults. This was worth remembering.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man sees no reason to change his ways.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Along with the poise and manner of royalty, the monarch is blessed with many princely virtues.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This monarch was born to rule.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is inherent and cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "I am your Prince, appointed by God. I am accountable to Him and only Him."
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This monarch was born to rule.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is inherent and cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: He has contempt for the tyranny of kings, and how their whims and fancies bring misery to the lives of their subjects.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man was born to be president of a republic.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is inherent and cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: That people should live in thrall and ignorance in this age of enlightenment is the real treachery.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man was born to be president of a republic.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is inherent and cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: In childhood he could only sleep if his bedtime stories were tales of dashing maritime adventure.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has invested in the navy.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be lost by more balanced spending.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: He has taken to wearing ceremonial uniforms at all times, which makes bathing a difficult business.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has invested heavily in the navy.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be lost by more balanced spending.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Government business is conducted from the deck of his ship, such is this man's dedication to nautical matters.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has deprived other departments to ensure the navy is properly funded.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait cannot now be removed.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A disdain for educational matters could be due to a love of outdoor pursuits, or just an intellectual limitation.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man isn't too bright, as a result education hasn't been a priority.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be removed through investment in educational buildings.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Books and learning are a waste of time - time that could be better spent riding, hunting, and feasting.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man isn't too bright, as a result education hasn't been a priority.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be reduced through investment in educational buildings.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: His refusal to invest in the education of his people keeps them ignorant and powerless against control.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man isn't too bright, as a result education hasn't been a priority.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Nose picking - not always his own nose, mind - is the least of this great man's unpleasant foibles.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Unpleasant children can become unpleasant adults.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This unfortunate foible will mark this person forever.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Nothing is more amusing to this man than a good fart, preferrably in the direction of an ambassador.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: No one would dare to tell this man to behave himself.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This crudity cannot be mended.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man's habit of scratching his privy parts and arse between dinner courses causes unease in visiting dignitaries.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Who in their right mind is going to tell this fellow that such manners would shame an ill-bred village idiot?
character_trait_levels.removal_text: These shameful excesses cannot now be curbed in any way.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Never short of a witty turn of phrase, this man's pithy repartee is renowned throughout the civilised world.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has been blessed with a sense of humour.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is natural and cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Despite a biting wit, he has the talent of making those concerned feel strangely better about themselves.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has been endowed with a fine sense of humour and a warm heart.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is natural and cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Unable to afford a commission, his ambitions are satisfied by ensuring the army have the lion's share of resources.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A high percentage of government spending has gone to the army.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be reduced via more balance in government spending.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Having studied war on an amateur basis, he now favours their needs at the expense of domestic matters.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A high percentage of government spending has gone to the army.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be reduced via greater balance in government spending.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: His devotion to the interests of the army borders on infatuation. Perhaps it's the fabulous uniforms?
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Domestic matters have been side-lined in favour of over-investment in the army.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is permanent and cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: There's nothing wrong with feathering one's own nest, surely it's merely a perk of the job?
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This fellow has been in a position of power long enough for it to corrupt him.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: The stain on his character cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "One for me, one for thee, one for the pot". This man believes in "creative" accounting in its purest sense.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This fellow has too long been in a position of power within government.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: The stain on his character cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Assets have been misappropriated, but he insists the funds were only "resting" in his account.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has wielded absolute power, and we all know what happens next.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: The stain on his character cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: The good things in life are there to be enjoyed, and take the population's mind off their everyday miseries.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has improved his nation's cultural landscape.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Centralised banking reduces dependence on private money-lenders, and gives government a float to play with.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has improved his nation's financial systems.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man has faith that prudently applied, the new theories of economy will fill his nation's coffers.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has developed his nation's financial systems.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: He is well-versed in the new fiscal thinking, this man is consulted in all matters of national income.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has greatly improved his nation's financial systems.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Whereas most people can be appeased with cheap whores and gin by the bucket, some of us have more refined tastes.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has done much for his nation's cultural landscape.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "Sir, this time you have surpassed yourself! Will you pass more of those scrumptious caramelised stoat intestines?"
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has greatly improved his nation's capacity for culture.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man believes centralising industry and increasing production capacity are the keys to advancement.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has improved his nation's industrial capabilities.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: He believes that the way forward is the centralised use of the latest machinery and production techniques.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This fellow has developed his nation's industrial capabilities.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This fellow has developed the latest industrial technology, and improved regional infrastructures to support it.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has greatly developed his nation's industrial capabilities.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: He keeps a tight rein on the privy purse strings, all expenditure must be justified in writing. In triplicate.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: The treasury has remained virtually untouched since he took charge.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait can be lost by more generous use of tax income.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A career in politics was mapped out for him, but his true passion was the sea. He champions the navy's cause at every juncture.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A high percentage of government spending has gone to the navy.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be reduced via more balance in government spending.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: He argues deftly in favour of developing the navy, feeling it is an essential element of national prestige.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A high percentage of government spending has gone to the navy.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be reduced via greater balance in government spending.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man's constant promotion of the navy and its wants has caused consternation amongst his peers. Hello sailor!
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Domestic matters have been side-lined in favour of over-investment in the navy.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is permanent and cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man is a firm believer that agriculture is the basis of happiness amongst the people.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has developed his nation's agricultural framework.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This fellow believes that the nation's wealth is best derived from working the land.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has greatly developed his nation's agricultural framework and technology.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: His radicalism borders on the republican, such is his desire to shake up the old order and improve ordinary people's lives.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man is a born radical, a champion of the lower orders.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is inherent and cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man wishes to preserve the power of the landed aristocracy, and their stranglehold over property and the people.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This fellow is dyed-in-the-wool reactionary, a staunch supporter of the ruling class.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is inherent and cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Realising the potential of his country's goods and resources is the road to wealth and prosperity for all.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has developed his nation's trade network.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This fellow believes in the power of a free market to maximise the nation's trade potential.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has greatly improved his nation's trade network.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Planting the seeds of faith in fertile soil is good for the preacher, too.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has spent his time in Europe well and wisely.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: Setbacks may make this man change his mind.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: There is an unalloyed pleasure in giving the faith to a people.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man's years in Europe have brought him some success.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man will never lose his dedication for bringing the light to Europeans.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: There is much in India to confirm a man in his faith, and make him want to spread the word.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Time does not pass in India. It merely is.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man may change his mind if things go badly.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Even the light of the Indian sun is a blessing, and lifts the spirit of any preacher.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Time spent in this age-old land has given this man an appreciation for all that is good in India.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man will not lose his abiding love for his Indian followers.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: People travel for days to hear him preach, such power have his words to move and inspire the souls of many.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man is a natural religious speaker.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is inherent and cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: The early morning runs and freezing baths of his schooldays have made him resistant to illness.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man's natural robustness has been enhanced by time spent in the countryside, away from city life.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: Time inside cities will adversely affect this man's health.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This fellow enhances his natural good humour with healthy appetites and regular exercise.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This fellow's natural healthiness has only been improved by spending time outside, away from city life.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: Time inside cities will do much to damage this man's otherwise rude health.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man only feels at home when outside with the elements, away from flthy, crowded city life.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man's natural wellbeing has been greatly improved by time spent outdoors, away from city life.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: He has developed a strong immune system, a little squalor won't affect him adversely.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man is careful who he associates with, trusting only a few, and telling them nothing that may compromise him.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has escaped assassination, and is permanently on guard.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait is permanent.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: He knows who his friends are, who the friends of his friends are, and who those friends of his friends are friends with.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: He has avoided assassination on a few occasions, and is keen to continue that pattern.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait is permanent.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: He is constantly surrounded by a dozen bodyguards, all armed to the teeth and ready to spring into action should anyone even look at him in a suspicious manner.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This fellow's mind has been broken, so frequent have attempts on his life become.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This character trait is permanent.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A deeply religious man, he observes practices rites with solemn dignity.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Religion has been a large part of this man's life from birth.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is inherent and cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Despite the worldly circles in which he moves, he still has deep spiritual beliefs.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: Religion has been a large part of this man's life from birth.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is inherent and cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: The slightest thing sends this man to his sickbed - a noxious smell, bright lights, anyone from Franconia, the number six...
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has spent a lot of time in unhealthy, crowded cities.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: Time outside cities will improve this man's health.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Perhaps an excess of bile has increased his melancholy? More likely his despondent moods have made him ill.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has spent too much time living in crowded, dirty places.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: Time outside cities will do much to improve this man's failing health.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: With death all around him, this man reckons he has all the symptoms.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has spent far too much time in disease-ridden cities.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: It doesn't matter where this fellow goes, he'll think himself unwell until death intervenes.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: The politics of power dictate his orders - he carries them out with efficiency, and a slightly worrying zeal.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has assassinated agents of rival nations.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be removed if an assassination attempt is unsuccessful.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: He kills for the pleasure, thinly disguised as political expediency, and may be unable to stop if the work dries up.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has assassinated several agents of rival nations.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be removed if several assassination attempts end in failure.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "If you kill a man, you're a murderer; kill many, you're a conqueror; kill them all..."
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has assassinated many agents of rival nations.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait cannot be removed, it is permanent.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: With a cutting wit for the ladies and a cutting sword for the men, this scoundrel is a "gentleman" in name alone.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This "gentleman" was blessed at birth with a talent for mischief.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: He will never change, for he sees no reason to "improve" himself.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man has a talent for provocative insults, and the skills to defend his so-called honour.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This "gentleman" was born with a cruel intelligence.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man's menacing nature can never change.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This man lives for the pain he can cause others - pain at sword's point, for preference.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This "gentleman" was born with a taste for the wicked.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man will have a nasty character until the day he dies.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: He has infiltrated enemy spy networks and alerted the authorities to their presence.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has spent time combatting enemy espionage.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be lost by assigning this agent to foreign climes.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Having convinced the enemy he is working for them, this fellow has fed disinformation ever since.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has spent a long time combating enemy espionage.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be lost by assigning this agent to foreign climes.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "They" think he is working for them. In truth, he's not sure who he's working for anymore.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has spent too much time combating enemy espionage.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait cannot now be lost, it is permanent.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: He has successfully planted explosives during a siege, allowing his own forces to gain entry more easily.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has blown fortified gates during a siege.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be removed if he fails to blow gates and survives the attempt.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: The go-to man for all things explosive, he has successfully placed petards on several occasions.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has blown fortified gates on several occasions.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait cannot now be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Although dressing as a woman is a cunning disguise to aid him in his espionage work, he quite likes it really.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has predelictions that naturally improve his espionage skills.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: The presence of this trait is due to nature, and cannot be removed.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: By day he is an ordinary fellow, by night "she" is a deadly femme fatale - after all, who would suspect a lady?
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has predelictions that greatly improve his espionage abilities.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: The presence of this trait is due to nature, and cannot be removed.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: His "gentleman's club" is inaccurately named, their chief business being Bacchanalian mischief and moral impiety.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has carried out espionage missions, and likes to unwind afterwards.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Drinking, wenching, feasting, and blasphemy are the vices of this debauched villain and his godless friends.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has carried out several espionage missions, and likes to unwind afterwards.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait cannot be lost, only improved.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Their excessive drinking, mock-religious ceremonies, and blatant whoring are deplorable displays of moral deviance. Nevermind.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has carried out many espionage missions, and likes to unwind afterwards.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait is permanent and cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: He has had success damaging enemy buildings, displaying an aptitude for sabotage.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has successfully sabotaged a building belonging to a rival nation.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be removed if he fails to sabotage a building and survives the attempt.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "You were only supposed to blow the doors off!" This man is a skilled saboteur, in fact he is almost too good.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has successfully sabotaged several buildings belonging to rival nations.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be removed if he fails to sabotage several buildings, yet survives the attempts.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: He creeps about unnoticed, pressing his ears to doors in the hope of learning useful facts.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has successfully spied on rival nations.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be removed if a spy mission is unsuccessful.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Accepted by his quarry as one of them, this man has gained access to classified information of much use to his employers.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has successfully completed several spying operations.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait can be removed if several spy missions end in failure.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A highly-skilled operative, this fellow is able to pass every useful detail of the enemy's plans to his true masters at home.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This man has successfully completed many spying operations.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This trait cannot be removed, it is permanent.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A little fat on a man's bones is an attractive feature for the ladies.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A lack of employment is this man's downfall.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: A little action in this man's life might improve his condition.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "Gluttony is what lesser people call a healthy appetite! They are envious, Sir, of my capacities!"
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A regular lack of employment is doing this man few favours.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: A prolonged period of excitement and action in this man's life might reduce his appetite.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A skilled combatant with both the knife and the fork. No dish is safe within arm's reach!
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A long period of inactivity is responsible for this condition.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: Orders to follow and useful work would make this man forget his precious food.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A meal is not properly over until this man cannot heave his fat arse off a dining chair.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A considerable time spent without real activity has lead to this unfortunate state.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man cannot control his insatiable greed, although it is certainly consuming him.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: His eating - and the endless thunderings from his bowels - keep this man apart from polite society.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: It has taken a career at the dining table to make this man into a trumpeting lump of lard.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man cannot improve his flatulent condition.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Sordid over-eating has reduced this man to a sick, overstuffed, blubbery creature, crippled by pain.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: A lifetime of over-indulgence and too little work has produced this man.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This man will always be crippled by his condition.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "A spade, Sir, is as good as a bayonet when applied with a little thought!"
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This general has achieved victories in a siege or two.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: These sapping skills cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Only a gardener, a madman or a siege expert would order quite so many trenches to be dug.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This general has brought several sieges to a successful conclusion.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This siegecraft cannot be lost.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "Any fortress, properly invested, will fall in time. Time and good sapping are great allies!"
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This general has conducted many successful sieges.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This general will never lose his siegecraft skills.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This text should not be translated.
character_trait_levels.explanation_text: This text should not be translated.
character_trait_levels.removal_text: This text should not be translated.
